items.title: Shared cognitive biases influence numerical judgments in macaques and crows
items.description:
Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Volume 122, Issue 44, November 2025.

items.title: James A. Estes: An ecologist’s quest to understand nature
items.description:
Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Volume 122, Issue 44, November 2025.
